item.description: DataScribe {.center} A structured data transcription module for the Omeka S platform. Download DataScribe!{.button} Download the ZIP, move it to the Omeka S modules/ directory, and unzip it there. Then go to your Omeka S installation under "Modules" and install DataScribe there. You can also consult the documentation or file issues. What is DataScribe? Scholars often collect sources, such as government forms or institutional records, intending to transcribe them into datasets which can be analyzed or visualized.
